message:
There's an invitations area in settings, but all it says is "
You’ve invited...

... nobody yet."
RIght now we have it set up so that you always invite someone to a group, never just generically to the site.
Zero state copy is one of my specialties (:
Go to a group, click "Group actions" on the top right, and then "Invite others"
That's something we'll think about adding as we launch publicly though
Ah, I see... makes sense, but you might want to put some explanatory copy in the invites area of the user's settings, so they know where to look
yeah, I think we should make it much easier to invite people
both to a single group and in general
